events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit as expected. I would like to request a refund.
The customer reported a refund request due to sizing issues with the jacket order, categorizing the case accordingly.
Assigning this refund case to customer service agent Emma for further handling and resolution.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m Emma and I will assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Thank you for your reply. The order number is #4567890123, and the jacket is brand new, I have not worn or washed it yet.
We have approved your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you, Emma. I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back right away using the label.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund successfully and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was processed and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
